creditline: Gift of Dennis Adrian in honor of the artist and in memory of Naomi Vine, M.A. '74 University of Chicago
description: highly stylized, patterned image of three abstracted, scantily clad female figures in provocative poses; R figure is wearing a corset and seated with legs apart, facing viewer; rear C figure is laying on stomach with legs in air, hair and head covered in open mouth pattern; LL figure is laying with legs open toward viewer, with geometric patterns on legs and breasts; landscape in background; black frame
title: Storage for a Seasonal Home
